name: Youtube Colorful Buttons
description:
Changes the buttons on Youtube to make them more aesthetically pleasing, as well as a few other modifications. I'll try and keep this updated as well as add new things as I see fit.

If I update something in a way you don't like, just comment out the code of the affected element- everything is labeled.
If you have an idea for something you would like to see added (life if you have a greasemonkey script adding elements), leave a comment and I'll add it.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("www.youtube.com") {

#watch-like {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , chartreuse, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*like button*/
#watch-unlike {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , #D72D2D, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*dislike button*/
#watch-playlists-button {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , gold, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*save to button*/
#watch-share {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , cyan, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*share button*/
#watch-embed {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , violet, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*embed button*/
#watch-flag {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , red, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*flag button*/
.action-bar-ratings-stats {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , orange, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*rating bars button*/
#watch-actions .action-bar-ratings-stats .likes-bar, #watch-actions .action-bar-ratings-stats .dislikes-bar {border-color: #828282 !important;}/*make ratings bars outline darker*/
#content.watch-wide #watch-video-container {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , black, rgb(50,50,50)) !important;}/*expanded mode darken side panels*/
#subscribeDiv, #editSubscriptionDiv {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , #FFF9C1, #FED81C) repeat scroll 0 0 #FFE971 !important;}/*subscribe button*/
#subscribeDiv:hover, #editSubscriptionDiv:hover {color: #F52525 !important;}
}/*subscribe button red text on hover*/
.search-term {-moz-border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px !important;}/*round search bar corners*/
.search-term:hover {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , #DDECFE, #E8F2FE) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*blue background search bar on hover*/
.search-term:focus {background: white !important;}/*search bar background white when selected*/
.comments-textarea {-moz-border-radius:5px 5px 5px 5px !important;}/*comments bar rounded edges*/
.watch-expander-head:hover {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , #BBDAFD, #DDECFE) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important; color: black !important;}/*background for expandable menus*/
.search-form .search-button {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , #BBDAFD, #DDECFE) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*search button*/
button[data-button-action="yt.www.comments.watch5.reply"] {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , #BBAAFF, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*reply*/
#watch-comment-vote-up {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , chartreuse, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*thumbs up comment*/
#watch-comment-vote-down {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , #D72D2D, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*thumbs down comment*/
button[title="Flag for spam"] {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , red, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*flag comment*/
#watch-comment-block-user {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , coral, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*block user*/
#watch-comment-unblock-user {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , #009999, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*unblock user*/
#watch-comment-remove-link {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , grey, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*remove*/
.yt-uix-pager .yt-uix-button {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top, peachpuff, pink) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*comment page buttons*/
.video-thumb {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top, lightslategrey, black) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*video thumbnail background*/
#watch-sidebar .watch-active-list .watch-module-head {-moz-border-radius-topright: 5px !important;}/*reccomendations top round corner*/
#watch-sidebar .watch-active-list.yt-uix-expander-collapsed .watch-module-body, .watch-next-list-actions {-moz-border-radius-bottomright: 5px !important;}/*reccomendations bottom round corner*/
#content.watch-wide #watch-sidebar .watch-active-list .watch-next-list-actions, #content.watch-wide #watch-sidebar .watch-active-list .watch-module-body {-moz-border-radius-bottomright: 0px !important;}/*reccomendations unround bottom corner*/
.watch-next-list-actions {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top, #EFEFEF, slategrey) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*reccomendations bar*/
button[class="reverse start yt-uix-button"] {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top, #EFEFEF, slategrey) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*options button*/
button[class="reverse start yt-uix-button"]:hover {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top, slategrey, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*options button hover*/
#watch-next-list-autoplay {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top, #EFEFEF, slategrey) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*autoplay button*/
#watch-next-list-autoplay:hover {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top, slategrey, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*autoplay button hover*/
#watch-next-list-shuffle {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top, #EFEFEF, slategrey) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*shuffle button*/
#watch-next-list-shuffle:hover {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top, slategrey, #EFEFEF) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*shuffle button hover*/

/******greasemonkey elements******/
button[data-tooltip-title="Lights out"] {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , grey, lightgrey) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*lights out*/
button[data-tooltip-title="Lights out"]:hover {background: -moz-linear-gradient(center top , #C0C0C0, #F0F0F0) repeat scroll 0 0 #F6F6F6 !important;}/*lights out hover*/
/******end greasemonkey elements******/
